amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary to assist Indian tribes in addressing shoreline erosion in the Upper Missouri River Basin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 912 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 912 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 912 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 912 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
